title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 401.7 - Ambulatory surgery services fee schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 401.7 - Ambulatory surgery services fee schedule

State Regulations

The fee schedule for ambulatory surgery services rendered
under the Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law on or after January 1, 1995 shall
be the schedule of fees for ambulatory surgery services under the Workers'
Compensation Law of the State of New York applicable to ambulatory surgery
services rendered on or after January 1, 1995, as set forth in sections 329.4
and 329.5 of this Title. This ambulatory surgery services fee schedule is
applicable in accordance with the provisions of section 329.4 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
401.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
